comments:
Eclipe: 3.2RC5
OS: Mac OS 10.4.5
Hardware: MacBook Pro (Intel), 2GB memory

The JBoss plug-in is referencing an internal class that no longer exists in Eclipse 3.2. This problem should be filed against the providers of the JBoss plug-in.
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
